(await instance.balanceOf(accounts[1].address)).toString()
await instance.mintIdea(accounts[1].address)
const accounts = await hre.ethers.getSigners()
const instance = await IdeaNFT.attach("0x5287db2bE7E0Fc9916BF5100F78D50b87e1240E6")
const IdeaNFT = await hre.ethers.getContractFactory("IdeaNFT")
const instance = await IdeaNFT.attach("0x5287db2bE7E0Fc9916BF5100F78D50b87e1240E6")
const IdeaNFT = await hre.ethers.getContractFactory
const IdeaNFT = await hre.ethers.getContractFactorconst instance = await IdeaNFT.attach
